data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
So close for West Ham as Jarrod Bowen's shot comes back off the post.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of West Ham.
Arsenal's Granit Xhaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Martin Atkinson awards West Ham a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of West Ham.
Pablo Fornals (West Ham) has received a first yellow card.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Mesut Ozil (Arsenal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Sokratis Papastathopoulos (Arsenal) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aaron Cresswell of West Ham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In London West Ham drive forward through Pablo Fornals. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson signals a Arsenal throw-in in West Ham's half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Sebastian Haller of West Ham is pulled up for offside.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Arsenal drive forward but Edward Nketiah is judged offside.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In London, Michail Antonio (West Ham) misses the target with a header.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in West Ham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Arsenal.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick West Ham.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Emirates Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Emirates Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In London Arsenal's Nicolas Pepe is caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Edward Nketiah gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal.
Important block from the West Ham defence as Nicolas Pepe fires in a strike for Arsenal.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Michail Antonio (West Ham) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Arsenal.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a Arsenal throw-in in West Ham's half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a first substitution, with Alexandre Lacazette replacing Edward Nketiah.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Arsenal.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Arsenal.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham.
Sokratis Papastathopoulos (Arsenal) gets a yellow card.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Ham's half?
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jarrod Bowen of West Ham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Nicolas Pepe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
Martin Atkinson awards West Ham a goal kick.
In London West Ham attack through Declan Rice. The finish is off target, however.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Reiss Nelson is replacing Nicolas Pepe for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
Free kick West Ham.
The match at Emirates Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on David Luiz, who is down injured.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
David Luiz is back on his feet again.
West Ham drive upfield and Jarrod Bowen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Declan Rice for West Ham drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In London, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal! Alexandre Lacazette gives Arsenal a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Mesut Ozil.
Michail Antonio for West Ham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
David Moyes is making the team's first substitution at Emirates Stadium with Tomas Soucek replacing Mark Noble.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham drives forward and Sebastian Haller gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
West Ham's Pablo Fornals breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Martin Atkinson awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
The away team have replaced Pablo Fornals with Felipe Anderson. This is the second substitution made today by David Moyes.
West Ham's Michail Antonio is whistled for offside at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal make their third substitution with Hector Bellerin replacing Mesut Ozil.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
At Emirates Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Arsenal's Reiss Nelson breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
West Ham have a goal kick.
Throw-in West Ham.
Martin Atkinson signals a West Ham throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Arsenal's area.
Free kick West Ham.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
That's full-time at Emirates Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Robert Snodgrass is replacing Jarrod Bowen for the away team.
Michail Antonio (West Ham) has received a yellow card from Martin Atkinson.
